{{- $title := .Get "title" -}} {{- $i18nKey := .Get "i18n" -}} {{- $content := .Inner -}} {{- $displayTitle := "" -}} {{- if $i18nKey -}} {{- $displayTitle = i18n $i18nKey -}} {{- else if $title -}} {{- $displayTitle = $title -}} {{- else -}} {{- $displayTitle = i18n "other_info" -}} {{- end -}} {{ $displayTitle }} {{ $content }}
